title: Murali No. 5
lyrics:
[NB: melody starts on a A]

[intro] Ladies and gentlemen, this is Murali No. 5
| (Dm) | (C) | (Dm) | (C) |

(Dm)One… two… three, four, five
Every(C)body in the car, so come on let's ride
To the… (Dm) liquor-store around the corner, the boys
Say they (C)want some gin and juice, but I really don't wanna

(Dm) Beerbust like I had last week 
I (C)must stay deep, because talk is cheap
I like (Dm)Aaron, Jo, Sheryl, Christina,
And (C)as I continue, you know they’re getting sweeter

(Dm) So what can I do I really beg you my Lord
(C) To me flirting it's just like sport
(Dm)Anything fly, it's all good let me (C)dump it, please set in the trumpet

[chorus]
A little bit of (Dm)Christine in my life, a little bit of (C)Struan by my side 
A little bit of (Dm)Roger is all I need, a little bit of (C)Marc is what I see 
A little bit of (Dm)Flore in the sun, a little bit of (C)Thuan all night long 
A little bit of (Dm)Jessica here I am, a little bit of (C)you makes me your man (Ah!)

[interlude, kazoo]
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm)
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm)
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm) Murali No. 5
| (Dm) (Dm) | (C-stop)Ah! (C-stop)

Jump (Dm)up and down and move it all around
Shake your (C)head to the sound, put your hands on the ground
Take (Dm)one step left and one step right
(C)One to the front and one to the side
(Dm)Clap your hands once, and clap your hands twice
And if it (C)looks like this then you are doing it right [straight to chorus]

[chorus]
A little bit of (Dm)Christine in my life, a little bit of (C)Struan by my side 
A little bit of (Dm)Roger is all I need, a little bit of (C)Marc is what I see 
A little bit of (Dm)Flore in the sun, a little bit of (C)Thuan all night long 
A little bit of (Dm)Jessica here I am, a little bit of (C)you makes me your man (Ah!)

[interlude, kazoo]
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm)
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm)
| (Dm) | (Dm) |
| (Dm) (the trumpet!) | (Dm) (the trumpet!)
| (Dm) Murali No. 5 | (Dm) Haha(C-stop)ha (C-stop)

[chorus]
A little bit of (Dm)Christine in my life, a little bit of (C)Struan by my side 
A little bit of (Dm)Roger is all I need, a little bit of (C)Marc is what I see 
A little bit of (Dm)Flore in the sun, a little bit of (C)Thuan all night long 
A little bit of (Dm)Jessica here I am, a little bit of (C)you makes me your man

(Dm)I… do… all to (C)fall in love with a girl like you
 'Cause (Dm)you can't run and you can't hide
(C)You and me gonna touch the sky

[interlude, kazoo]
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm)
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm)
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (Dm) (Dm) Murali No. 5
| (Dm) (Dm-C) | (C-stop)Ah! (C-stop)
[end]
